summary: It is a complement to the mod "UnderC - Removable Underwear"
descriptionHtml:
It is a complement to the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22843/?tab=3&selected_game=110&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fid%3D22843%26user%3D1%26gid%3D110&pUp=1]UnderC - Removable Underwear[/url], with this one becomes compatible with the curvy bodies of "CBBE" and with the mods of nude male bodies.

With this mod the problem of meshes and textures is solved.

Installation:
Only put the files in the Data Folder

Known Bugs:
Sometimes when you remove your clothes, the Underwear disappears, the only solution so far is to remove the underwear and put it back
author: Ryuuken23
